title: start
name: start
summary: Starts a new CloudBridge project in the specified PATH

args.[template]:
Starter templates can either come from a named template, 
(ex: tabs, sidemenu, blank),
a Github repo, a Codepen url, or a local directory.
Codepen url, ex: http://codepen.io/cloudbridge/pen/odqCz
Defaults to CloudBridge "showcase" starter template

options.--appname|-a: Human readable name for the app (Use quotes around the name)
options.--id|-i: Package name for the app config, ex: com.mycompany.myapp
options.--zip-file|-z: URL to download zipfile for starter template

name: platform
summary: Add platform target for building an CloudBridge app

args.<PLATFORM>: One or more of the valid platform {windows|android}

name: build
summary: Locally build an CloudBridge project for a given platform

name: run
summary: Run an CloudBridge project on a connected device

options.--debug|-d: Enable Chromium DevTools in the given port.

name: bower
summary: Add or remove bower packages to you CloudBridge app

args.{list|clean}:
Action to perform. 
list|ls: List the packages in cache.
clean|rm: Delete the cached packages.
